Boost your wellbeing this Libraries Week with our top non-fiction picks

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 8, 2018

Libraries Week runs from 8 - 13 October 2018. As this year's theme is wellbeing, we've put together a list non-fiction titles to give you a boost.

Get ready for the Sutton Hoo library roadshow with these top reads

Written by Brandon King · Published Oct 8, 2018

Staff from Sutton Hoo are visiting several Suffolk libraries with their fascinating information and artefacts over the next few months. If you want to know more, why not have a look at some of the many books about this outstanding archaeological site?

Find your new favourite graphic novel series on OverDrive

Written by Lisa Brennan · Published Oct 4, 2018

Did you know our OverDrive eBook service has a great selection of graphic novels to choose from? Why not start reading a new series?

Discover or rediscover the genius of Prince with our Freegal digital music service

Written by Lisa Brennan · Published Oct 4, 2018

Freegal have recently expanded their Prince collections. What better excuse to listen to the late, great musician's work?

Immerse yourself in the magical world of Harry Potter with our BorrowBox eAudio service

Written by Lisa Brennan · Published Oct 4, 2018

Whether you're a confirmed Potterhead, or are finally giving in to your curiosity, eAudio offers a great alternative way to enjoy the Harry Potter canon.

Celebrate Aretha Franklin's amazing life and talent with our Freegal service

Written by Lisa Brennan · Published Sep 4, 2018

Soul legend Aretha Franklin recently died at the age of 76. We've put together a list of albums on Freegal to help you pay tribute to such an amazing artist.
